text: Bas Roorda (born 13 February 1973 in Assen) is a former Dutch football goalkeeper. His former teams are NEC Nijmegen, Roda JC, FC Groningen and PSV Eindhoven. On 26 March 2010 it was announced his expiring contract with PSV, will not be extended. He played one match for PSV, on 3 April 2008, he came on as a substitute for Heurelho Gomes in an away game against Fiorentina. He came on in the 60th minute of the game, conceding no goals. title: Bas Roorda
